author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: لَا فَوَ ٱلَّذِي نَفْسِي بِيَدِهِ لَنْ يَقْدِرُوْا وَلَنْ يَسْتَطِيعُوْا وَلَوْ  يَكُوْنُ بَعْضُهُمْ لِبَعْضٍ ظَهِيرًا
translation: Nay, by the One in Whose hand is my soul, they are not, and never shall be able to do this, even should they combine to assist one another.
